resources.string: It allows to draw Candy Crush solutions on your screen, on top of other applications.
Necessary for us to know when you are on Candy Crush App. We do not analyze your screen until then.
We need records to find Candy Crush Sweets.
Hint : to stop your Candy Crush Solver, just turn off one of the buttons above.

Candy Crush Solver is an application that solves Candy Crush. When accessibility is activated, it looks for the game and analyzes it. If you do not want Candy Crush Solver to see your screen anymore, you can remove accessibility access at any moment, by turning off the switch above.
Learn how to use Candy Crush Solver
Overlay permission is always on for API under 23. You cannot disable it.
We advise you to stay in default mode (display the best move), as it will be clearer and simpler.
Cheater started : best move will be displayed
Cheater started : every move will be displayed
Could not find a real move, new try…
Error : could not load OpenCV library
Cheater stopped : restart it in app
Candy Crush is not installed on your phone
